item.description:
I have received an email from Polly Hubbard (Manager of Education Programs Peabody Museum, Harvard University) regarding an event on 4/20

===
I wonder if some of your members with families might want to come to this performance ($2) and workshop on Saturday April 20 to practice language skills. I don't think I can attach the flyer here but there is a link to the website below.
http://reservations.hmnh.harvard.edu/Info.aspx?EventID=16.
Hope you think this would be fun!
===

If you are interested, please go to above link to make a reservation.
Looks like they have performance at 1PM, choice of two workshops 2:15-3:00 or 3:00-3:45.

https://www.peabody.harvard.edu/family

I am shown as this Event organizer, but I will not be able to be here.
This is rather just a event announcement. Use this page as if anyone want to get together at this event. Make a reservation then other member will know who is coming.

Thanks,
Mika
item.name: Cat Mountain Performance and Japanese Mask-Making
